body.description: Amazon Basics Renewing Salicylic Acid Cleanser is formualted without fragrance and mechanical exfoliants providing smoothing properties for normal skin. Gentle foaming formula with Salicylic Acid, Essential ceramides, and Vitamin D to provide antioxidant benefits. Removes dirt and oil while softening the skin, gentle for daily use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser Formulated without fragrance and mechanical exfoliants How to Use Cleanse skin twice a day. Wet face. Apply to hands, add water and work into a lather. Massage face gently. Rinse thoroughly. Suitable for Normal Skin Types Great for normal skin, removing dirt and oil while softening and smoothing skin Beneficial Antioxidants Contains Salicylic Acid, Essential ceramides, and Vitamin D to provide antioxidant benefits

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cleanser - Pump didn't work tho
reviews.reviewText: In all honesty, I don't ask a lot from a facial cleanser, except to clean well and not leave my skin feeling weird in any way. I let after-shower products do the work my skin needs.This one got my attention, tho, because of the salicylic acid and the good value. I know salicylic acid doesn't irritate my skin, and the extra exfoliation will help. And unlike other exfoliating products I might forget to use, like before bed or in the morning, I have to clean my face in the shower. So check off two boxes - I won't forget to exfoliate and it's not costing me a lot.The product is a clear gel, sort of, but not too thick, and has no scent (love that). It leaves my skin feeling clean with no dryness or weird residue. I haven't used it enough to prove any discernable difference is definitely because of the cleanser. I'll be back here with an update if I do. For now, I simply like it. Unless I find something better, and at the same or better price point, I'm sticking with this cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exfoliate with a Buf-Puff, Removes Makeup and Keeps Your Skin Looking Young!
reviews.reviewText: I am 53, I use this to cleanse my face. I have been scrubbing with a buf-puff daily using Neutrogena liquid soap for years. I found this a couple years ago and use this now daily instead. Stay out of the sun ladies, wear your vampire sub block if you must go out in the daylight, and use something like this to stay looking young as long as possible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It feels nice
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help my pore situation. Not sure it makes a huge difference. It’s been 4 weeks already- but for the price, didn’t expect much. But My face feels clean after using, rinses well-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great facial cleanser
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the facial cleanser and does just as well as the name brand. I definitely be putting it on auto-ship,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not too strong, and has helped my skin appear smoother.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For The Price Can't Complain
reviews.reviewText: I usually use CERAVE SA cleaner and have only used that cleanser for the past 3 years. I was hoping to find a dupe of it to start saving money. I go through each CERAVE bottle in 2 months and each time I have to replace it the price has gone up. I really had high hopes for this cleanser because AMAZON basics makes great and comparable products. This one I give a C+. Consistency of product is kind of slimy and does not lather. Very disappointing. Also the smell is weird. Kind of a cheap malt liquor scent. But it cleanses pretty well and leaves my skin smooth. I have no issues with the packaging or the pump.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like cerave
reviews.reviewText: This stuff has the consistency and smell just like the cerave salicylic face wash. The only difference is the price. I will be shopping more Amazon face products because of this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth a try.
reviews.reviewText: Been using this for about a month. Skin is clear and bright. Cleanser not harsh but effective. I've been making sure to wash my face with it for a full 60 seconds.
